participant_abstract.sent: We built up a product given the initial specifications with a reasonable satisfactory evaluation.

participant_actions.sent: We will find more general features for the universal remote control.

participant_decisions.sent: The cost was under the maximum allowed.
General points of evaluation are satisfied except those related with the moment of buying it.
The final was very fancy and functional enough, which guarantees an optimal cost.

participant_problems.sent: The main difficulty was that the final product was not appealing enough to be sold, which makes it quite useless.
